Jobs.title: Purchasing Staff
Jobs.description:
Responsibilities:
Receive purchase requests from users.
Able to negotiate prices.
Create purchase order.
Make sure the ordered goods come as requested.
Create documentation according to the applicable SOP.

Jobs.title: Media Buying Supervisor
Jobs.description:
Responsibilities:
Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Business.
Able to negotiate prices.
Preferably Supervisor specialized in Marketing/Business Development or equivalent..
Create documentation according to the applicable SOP.

Jobs.title: Frontend Developer
Jobs.description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining user interfaces for our web applications using modern frontend technologies and frameworks.

Jobs.title: Backend Developer
Jobs.description: We are seeking a Backend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the frontend. You will also be responsible for integrating the frontend elements built by your co-workers into the application.

Jobs.title: Software Engineer
Jobs.description: Responsible for designing, developing, and testing software applications.

Jobs.title: Marketing Coordinator
Jobs.description: Responsible for assisting with marketing campaigns, developing marketing materials, and coordinating events.

Jobs.title: Data Analyst
Jobs.description: Responsible for analyzing and interpreting complex data sets and communicating insights to stakeholders.

Jobs.title: Graphic Designer
Jobs.description: Responsible for creating visual concepts, using computer software or by hand, to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, and captivate consumers.

Jobs.title: Sales Representative
Jobs.description: Responsible for selling products or services to customers, negotiating prices, and managing customer relationships.

Jobs.title: Human Resources Manager
Jobs.description: Responsible for overseeing the hiring and management of employees, developing policies and procedures, and ensuring compliance with labor laws.

Jobs.title: Content Writer
Jobs.description: Responsible for creating written content for websites, social media, and other digital platforms.

Jobs.title: Data Entry Specialist
Jobs.description: We are looking for a meticulous Data Entry Specialist to join our team. You will be responsible for accurately inputting and managing large amounts of data, ensuring that all information is up-to-date and error-free.

Jobs.title: Human Resources Manager
Jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced Human Resources Manager to oversee all aspects of our HR operations. You will be responsible for recruiting and hiring new employees, managing employee benefits and compensation, and ensuring compliance with all HR laws and regulations.

Jobs.title: Financial Analyst
Jobs.description: We are seeking a skilled Financial Analyst to join our team. You will be responsible for analyzing financial data, preparing financial reports, and providing insights and recommendations to help our company make informed business decisions.

Jobs.title: Web Developer
Jobs.description: We are looking for a talented Web Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining our company's website, ensuring that it is user-friendly, responsive, and visually appealing.

Jobs.title: Operations Manager
Jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced Operations Manager to oversee our company's day-to-day operations. You will be responsible for managing production, logistics, and supply chain activities, as well as developing and implementing process improvements to increase efficiency and profitability.

Companies.name: PT Perindustrian Bapak Djenggot (Orang Tua Group)
Companies.description: OT adalah perusahaan consumer goods yang memproduksi berbagai macam produk kebutuhan sehari-hari

Companies.name: PT Tirta Alam Segar
Companies.description: WINGS Group is one of the largest and most established consumer goods manufacturer in Indonesia focusing in laundry, household, personal care, and Food & Beverage products

Companies.name: PT Gojek Indonesia
Companies.description: PT Gojek Indonesia adalah perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang teknologi informasi dan menawarkan berbagai solusi digital.

Companies.name: PT LG Electronics Indonesia
Companies.description: PT LG Electronics Indonesia adalah perusahaan manufaktur yang memproduksi berbagai jenis produk elektronik.
